alternatives.transcript: On a dark What a nice surprise. Mirrors on the ceiling. They pick champagne on ice. And she said, we are all just listeners here of our own device. And in the master's chambers, they're gathered for the feast. They stab it with their stealing eyes, but they just can't kill the beast.
